title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4212.6 - Identification card required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4212.6 - Identification card required

State Regulations

No stable employee shall be permitted to work without
first filing application for commission license and obtaining track
identification card; and no stable employee shall be paid off on discontinuance
until he has surrendered his said identification card which shall be
immediately delivered to the track office. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4212.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
